title: Graduated from IT University
description: Completed my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, focusing on software development and web technologies. This was a foundational period where I built a strong understanding of core programming concepts.

title: First Steps as a Developer
description: Landed my first role as a Junior Developer, working on various client projects. Gained practical experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side scripting.

title: Explored Culinary Arts
description: Took a detour to explore a passion for cooking and worked as a Chef. This experience taught me a lot about creativity, precision, and working under pressure in a fast-paced environment.

title: Returned to Tech
description: Rediscovered my passion for technology and decided to dive back into software development, focusing on modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Node.js for backend development.

title: Deep Dive into React & Portfolio Build
description: Intensively studied React, TypeScript, and modern frontend practices. Started building personal projects, including this very portfolio website, to solidify my skills.
